members.name: MAXGTRIDSIZE
members.comment: Maximum number of bytes returned by getGlobalTransactionId().

members.name: MAXBQUALSIZE
members.comment: Maximum number of bytes returned by getBranchQualifier().

members.name: getFormatId
members.comment: Obtain the format identifier part of the XID.

return: Format identifier. O means the OSI CCR format.

members.name: getGlobalTransactionId
members.comment: Obtain the global transaction identifier part of XID as an array of bytes.

members.name: getBranchQualifier
members.comment: Obtain the transaction branch identifier part of XID as an array of bytes.

name: javax.transaction.xa.Xid
comment: The Xid interface is a Java mapping of the X/Open transaction identifier XID structure. This interface specifies three accessor methods to retrieve a global transaction format ID, global transaction ID, and branch qualifier. The Xid interface is used by the transaction manager and the resource managers. This interface is not visible to the application programs.
